testcase.name: Test the redirected page when logged in
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to the login page......................................passed When User fills the login form with username and password...................passed And Clicks on signin button to login........................................passed Then User will be navigated to the accountpage..............................passed Then page title of the page should have MyAccount...........................passed

testcase.name: Test the logout button exist
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to the login page......................................passed When User fills the login form with username and password...................passed And Clicks on signin button to login........................................passed Then User will be navigated to the accountpage..............................passed When user hovers on the navbar..............................................passed Then logout button will exist on the right side.............................passed
